title: 'Worth of money'
body: 'The product is very much worth of money. At this price range I would say best quality. It was well packaged. The sofa has good fabric with sturdy built quality.'

title: 'Low quality'
body: Sofa looked good for the first few weeks however afterwards if you dust or wipe it with cloth the colour comes off. Also if you sit you can hear wood and other sound. title: 'Value for money'
body: 'Writing this review after 2 weeks of using this sofa. First time we brought furniture just by looking at photos and description of the product. But believe me this is exactly what they shown and delivered. I was expecting the fabric bit softer but then considering the value proposition it is fine. It‚Äôs comfortable to seat quality of the material is mostly good. Also the package was delivered by blue-dart and it was very well secured product did not sustain any damages at all. Thanks seventh heaven for such a nice and affordable product.'

title: 'features'
body: 'got it delivered earlier than the promised delivery date .The sofa packed properly to avoid damge . the quality of the sofa is very nice and also very comfortable . i like it so much'

title: 'One of the best packing.'
body: 'Package came quite early like 8.30am. It has some good weight on it. Unwraping was a challenge coz it was packed like a tank. No issues so far. Some threads are exposed here and there but with a scissor removed everything. One of the leg is a bit misaligned though.'

title: 'Fantastic product. Go for it!!!!'
